amendment.description: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to defund the Woodrow Wilson International Center for Scholars and moves its $12 million in appropriations to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for the Woodrow Wilson International Center for Scholars, Salaries and Expenses by $12 million and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 236 (Roll no. 387).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Brecheen amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 236 (Roll no. 387).
